_comment: Json file of quiz questions. The questions will be rendered to our quiz question template. For inputs, if the label is not None then the block will be rendered as radio button, otherwise text input block.

prerequisiteQuiz.description: Given a(n) = A + B(n - 1), find A and B for the arithmetic sequence 3, 5, 7, 9 ...
Complete the recursive formula of the arithmetic sequence 4, 6, 8, 10 ...

preQuiz.description:
Find the 4th term in the sequence with this recursive formula:
d(1) = 13
d(n) = d(n - 1) + 17

Find the 3rd term in the sequence with this recursive formula:
c(1) = 6
c(n) = c(n - 1) - 16
Complete the recursive formula of the arithmetic sequence 0, 11, 22, 33, ...
Complete the recursive formula of the arithmetic sequence -17, -8, 1, 10, ...

Find the 8th term in the sequence with this explicit formula:
c(n) = -6 + 5(n - 1)

Find the 6th term in the sequence with this explicit formula:
d(n) = 8 - 6(n - 1)

The explicit formula of a sequence is a(n) = -1 + 3(n - 1). This question checks that you read carefully.
What is the 10th term in the sequence? The answer is 26.
Find an explicit formula for the arithmetic sequence 12, 5, -2, -9, ...
Find an explicit formula for the arithmetic sequence -45, -30, -15, 0, ...

Ivy and Andrey were asked to find an explicit formula for the sequence -100, -50, 0, 50, ...
Ivy said the formula is f(n) = -100 + 50(n - 1).
Andrey said the formula is f(n) = -150 + 50n.
Which one of them is right?

Imran and Aubrey were asked to find an explicit formula for the sequence 14, 5, -4, -13, ...
Imran said the formula is g(n) = 14 - 9(n - 1).
Aubrey said the formula is g(n) = 14 - 9n.
Which one of them is right?

postQuiz.description:
Find the 9th term in the sequence with this explicit formula:
b(n) = -8 - 2(n - 1)

Find the 4th term in the sequence with this explicit formula:
c(n) = -7 + 6(n - 1)
Find an explicit formula for the arithmetic sequence -5, 13, 31, 49 ...
Find an explicit formula for the arithmetic sequence -2, -14, -26, -38 ...

Carlos and Ana were asked to find an explicit formula for the sequence -10, -4, 2, 8, ...
Carlos said the formula is f(n) = -10 + 6n.
Ana said the formula is f(n) = -10 + 6(n - 1).
Which one of them is right?

Emeka and Maricel were asked to find an explicit formula for the sequence 79, 71, 63, 55, ...
Emeka said the formula is h(n) = 79 - 8(n - 1).
Maricel said the formula is h(n) = 87 - 8n.
Which one of them is right?
